cause.description:
Children, Incorporated partners with existing facilities like schools and community centers to provide support to impoverished children. We also support low-income young adults who are pursuing higher education. With assistance from our sponsors, CI donates food, clothing, school supplies, medical services, school fees, and other necessities to thousands of children throughout the world.
For more information, go to http://www.childrenincorporated.org/
(Reminder: If you sponsor a child, please don't post any identifying information about him or her on this page. Click here for CI's privacy policy: http://www.children-inc.org/Privacy.aspx .)
1. All children deserve adequate health care.
2. All children deserve to be educated.
3. All children deserve proper nourishment.
4. All children deserve adequate shelter and clothing.
cause.mission: To assist children of all races and creeds by administering to their physical, emotional, and educational needs.
